text_block_list.text:
Several days later. A track meet was held, in order to encourage 
students to challenge themselves and grow. There was an unusual 
amount of excitement in the air.

Now, Maruzensky escapes and Symboli Rudolf chases! 
This race has quickly become a dead heat between 
these two as they pull away from the pack!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
Getting to see something like this at school, we're super lucky! 
-Oh, they're reaching the final corner!!
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaaa!!
text_block_list.name: Both

text_block_list.text:
T-tremendous! In one word, tremendous! Will the "Emperor" catch 
up, or will the "Super Car" pull away, this last 100m, is the 
battle of the century!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
With a stiff expression on her face, Sakura Chiyono O fled from 
the stands. Without thinking, I followed after her.

When I finally found Sakura Chiyono O, 
she was soaked from head to toe.

…Ha! T-Trainer-san! Um, I-I'm fine! I couldn't do anything 
about this itchiness, so I just poured some water over myself!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Itchiness, no, um… fuzziness? Nervousness? 
This feeling of dizziness in my head and heart-
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: …This… feeling…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
…Sorry… 
Really, it's a feeling that's… not that cute sounding.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
It was a wonderful race. As intense as a G1 race. 
A breath taking, overwhelming distinguished battle-
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Seeing a race like that, 
for some reason, like this-
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
There's no way, that I'll be able to 
line up beside them like that.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
…O-or something like that? Ahaha! 
Sorry, for some reason, I just kept saying some weird things!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
choice_data_list: You won't know if you don't try
You won't know if you don't try

text_block_list.text: …do you… think so?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
E-ever since that day, I've looked up to Maruzen-san, doing all 
the things I could, at least I believe that to be the case.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
I-I've even grown a bit, my race times have gotten better, 
even my form, the instructor p-praised it-
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Maybe I've gotten a little closer, I felt like I was getting 
closer…! Or so I thought, but!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: By working hard, and growing bit by bit, I understand…!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
… 
The world, isn't like that…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Sakura Chiyono O suddenly pulled a letter out of her pocket, 
-and forcefully tore it up throwing it on the ground.
…Haa… Haa…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
…Ah… S-sorry! 
Um, I… I'll be taking my leave!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
She picked up the shredded letter and properly threw it in the 
trash. Shortly after that she took off running.

"Someday, being able to run with you 
on a grand stage, is my dream!"
text_block_list.name: Letter

text_block_list.text:
-She was so courteous, that even in the torn letter I could see 
how her hands had been trembling while she was writing it.

I was worried about Sakura Chiyono O. But I had no idea on how I 
should speak to her - and then one day-

Some advice regarding Chiyo-chan? 
Did something happen, Rudolf?
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text:
I don't think you haven't heard but… After the mock race a few 
days ago, I received a report from Hishi Amazon.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text:
For a few days she's been watching over her, but it seems like 
her heart isn't there. And she's been looking unwell…
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text:
Admiration and hopelessness are inseparable. Many Uma Musume have 
left the school, unable to fulfill their dreams. -"I can't catch 
up to you". How many times have I been told that?
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: It's the same for you, isn't it?
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text:
… Fufu. 
As usual, you're such a worry-wart, aren't you?
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text:
It's true that that girl, probably isn't a prodigy. 
I'm sure she understands this herself.
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text:
That's why every morning, she's running on the grounds, 
confirming her condition, always, always thinking about what she 
should do to grow even more.
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text:
Doesn't that mean that, everyday she's standing up 
and earnestly facing her own weakness? She's got a 
strong heart… That's why, it'll be okay.
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text:
…That's true, little by little continuing to face your own 
weakness, at first glance seems easy, but it's no small feat.

Sakura Chiyono O may have been like that originally, but the one 
that made her that way now, was most likely-

"Someday, being able to run with you 
on a grand stage, is my dream!"
text_block_list.name: Letter

text_block_list.text:
Right now, she's just missing a little bit of the resolve to get 
hurt. Once she gets that resolve, she'll be reaching for those 
heights in the blink of an eye.
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text:
…is that so? 
I guess that was a bit of an insensitive question.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text:
Sakura Chiyono O won't falter. With just a little bit more 
courage, she'll be able to run with a smile again.

-Before I realized it, I was running down the 
stairs, looking for Sakura Chiyono O.
